description:
Corporate and personal security is part of the life of every people. Everyone have a home and work somewere, everyone travel and have a car. All these things pose hazards - fire, theft of property and information, accidents, hazards related to our work by ourselves unforeseen actions that lead to crisis situations.

To protect the most of all the dangers that stalk our best we can do is to be informed and prepared for any danger. In this tutorial we will show you an overview of all types of hazards that are around us. You will receive information on how to prevent and anticipate these hazards. You will learn how to be prepared in case of any danger.

However, always remember that the best protection is prevention.


The course include the following video topics:

1. Personal & Physical security

2. Information security

3. Corporate governance, incl. Compliance and Ethics

4. Crime prevention and detection, Fraud deterrence

5. Risk management

6. Business continuity planning

7. Crisis management

8. Environment, safety and health

A few word about the author of this course Todor Todorov:

- Ex-military officer in....

- Well trained – Sweden, India, The Netherlands

- Experienced – National Armed Forces, UN, Volvo, ING, PwC, OSAC
title: Corporate and Personal Security
